rcsbids module¶

Retrieve the list of PDB IDs from the RCSB website, given an advanced query in json format.

Usage:

python rcsbids.py –query query.json –output output.txt

rcsbids.retrieve_pdb_ids(query)[source]¶

Retrieve the list of PDB IDs from the RCSB website, given an advanced query in json format.

Parameters

query – advanced query in json format.

Returns

list of PDB IDs.

rcsbids.search_and_download_ids(query, output, separator='\n')[source]¶

Search and download PDB IDs from the RCSB website, given an advanced query in json format.

Parameters

  • query – path to the json file containing the advanced query.

  • output – path to the output file.
